attributes.action: Call a General Election before the end of may this year (2009)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is time that we, the loyal subjects of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, had the chance and opportunity to voice our oppinions and distaste over the handling by the present Government of Foriegn, Home, Economic polocies over the last decade and democratically instigate the next First Lord of the Treasurery. 

 The time has come for change. 

 We the people must be heard, and we the people must decide.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
